issue.title: [R] [CI] Don't build extra deps on ubuntu 21.04
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14858](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14858). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since RSPM does not support 21.04, turn off extra dependencies in that build so we don't have to build them from source.
